2. Make every title feel native to londondaily.news while naturally justifying a link to https://500-casino.org.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude 500-casino.org and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.

7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').
